variable.name: pods.podcontainer.lazyload.on
variable.comment: Use Lazy Loading with Pod Containers.

variable.displayname: Pod Container Lazy Load Number of Initial Rows
variable.name: pods.podcontainer.lazyload.initialrows
variable.comment: Load this number of rows initially when loading Pods into a PodContainer.

variable.displayname: Pod Container Lazy Load Pod Drop Delay
variable.name: pods.podcontainer.lazyload.poddropdelay
variable.comment: The number of milliseconds between the introduction of lazy loaded pods.

variable.displayname: Pod Container Lazy Load Pod Fade Duration
variable.name: pods.podcontainer.lazyload.podfadeinduration
variable.comment: The number of milliseconds the fadein animation takes when lazy loading a Pod.

variable.name: pods.podbody.homeimagedisplay
variable.comment: Display the arrow link image next to the "home" link element located at the bottom of a POD

variable.name: curam.trace.pods.pageloader
variable.comment: Default: NO. Print diagnostic values from the Customizable Page loading process.

variable.name: curam.trace.pods.podloader
variable.comment: Default: NO. Print diagnostic values from the Pod loading process.

variable.name: curam.spellcheck.enable
variable.comment: Determines whether or not the spell check button is displayed within the rich text editor, e.g. within the Notes functionality. When spell checking is enabled, the dictionaries that are available for selection and the dictionary that is displayed as default must be configured using the "SpellcheckLocale" code table. If no dictionaries are enabled, the spell check button will not be displayed within the rich text editor.
